item.title: JetBlue announces Barcelona, Milan as 2 newest European destinations
item.description: JetBlue will expand its transatlantic service in Boston with two new European destinations in 2026: Milan, Italy, and Barcelona, Spain.

item.title: How to prepare for the best Black Friday and Cyber Monday travel bargains
